app.title: StopAddict
toggles.title: Enable what you track
toggles.hint: You can change this anytime. Disabled modules are hidden.
stats.title: Statistics
stats.hint: Based on your entries (all types). Orange line: daily limit if set.
cal.title: Calendar
cal.editor.hint: Adjust the selected day. “+” adds an entry dated that day, “−” removes last entry of that type.
settings.title: Settings
settings.baseline.auto: Auto baseline if goals empty (30-day avg)
settings.econ.hint: Savings are computed from the baseline (goals or 30-day average). Never negative.
io.title: Import / Export
io.disclaimer: Savings and costs are estimates based on your settings and inputs. They may not reflect your real life.
about.title: About & Help
about.rem1: Savings are estimates (settings, honest usage, spending habits).
about.rem2: No data is sent: everything is stored locally on the device.
about.rem3: You can erase all data at any time (Import/Export).
about.age.hint: Check if you are of legal age in your country:
about.age.check: I confirm I am of legal age.
about.emergency.hint: In distress, call directly from your phone.
about.reset.hint: The “Erase all data” button is in Import/Export.
